data.name: BadgeIcon
data.comment: This text is used with the badging glyph. %1 is the contact name.

data.name: BadgeIconTextOverride
data.comment: This format string is used for the automation name. It is 'Person Name, badgetext', where badgetext is a user specified string like skype.

data.name: BadgeItemPlural1
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 21,31,41,etc. %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemPlural2
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 3-4. %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemPlural3
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 22-24, 32-34, 42-44, etc. %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemPlural4
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 0, 20, 25-30, 35-40, etc. (fallback plural). %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemPlural5
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 5-10. %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemPlural6
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 11-19. %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemPlural7
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 2. %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemSingular
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of items in the person picture badging area, when that number is 1. %1 is the contact name and %2 is the number of items.

data.name: BadgeItemTextOverride
data.comment: This format string is used for the automation name. It is 'Person Name, badgenumber badgetext', where badge text is a user specified string overriding 'item(s)'.

data.name: BasicRatingString
data.comment: English example: Rating, 1.0 of 5.

data.name: CommunityRatingString
data.comment: English example: Community Rating, 3.3 of 6.

data.name: GroupName
data.comment: This text is used as the generic narrator text when the group glyph is showing.

data.name: NumberBoxDownSpinButtonName
data.comment: Automation name for the down button

data.name: NumberBoxUpSpinButtonName
data.comment: Automation name for the up button

data.name: PersonName
data.comment: This text is used as the generic narrator text when there is no display name or initials.

data.name: ProofingMenuItemLabel
data.comment: The label for the text context menu item that provides the proofing menu.

data.name: RatingControlName
data.comment: UNUSED

data.name: RatingLocalizedControlType
data.comment: A simple description of the control for UIA

data.name: RatingsControlName
data.comment: UNUSED

data.name: RatingUnset
data.comment: This text is used to show the number of stars none are selected.

data.name: SplitButtonSecondaryButtonName
data.comment: Automation name for the secondary button.

data.name: ToggleSwitchOff
data.comment: Default text for "Off" for ToggleSwitch.

data.name: ToggleSwitchOn
data.comment: Default text for "On" for ToggleSwitch.

data.name: ProgressBarErrorStatus
data.comment: This is used to announce Error state.

data.name: ProgressBarIndeterminateStatus
data.comment: This is used to announce Indeterminate state.

data.name: ProgressBarPausedStatus
data.comment: This is used to announce Paused state.

data.name: ProgressRingIndeterminateStatus
data.comment: This is used to announce Indeterminate state.

data.name: NavigationBackButtonName
data.comment: Automation name for the nav view provided back button

data.name: NavigationBackButtonToolTip
data.comment: ToolTip caption for the back button

data.name: NavigationButtonClosedName
data.comment: Automation name for the hamburger button when it is in a closed state

data.name: NavigationButtonOpenName
data.comment: Automation name and tooltip caption for the hamburger button when it is in an open state, and tooltip caption for the close button

data.name: NavigationCloseButtonName
data.comment: Automation name for the nav view provided close button

data.name: NavigationOverflowButtonName
data.comment: Automation name for the nav view more button when panel is on top

data.name: NavigationOverflowButtonText
data.comment: Text for the nav view more button when panel is on top

data.name: NavigationViewItemDefaultControlName
data.comment: Default automation id if no name or id is provided

data.name: NavigationViewSearchButtonName
data.comment: Name for the compact view search button

data.name: SettingsButtonName
data.comment: Automation name for the settings button
